newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY O/N RATES END STEADY AT 19.75 PCT.
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY O/N RATES END STEADY AT 19.75 PCT.

text.p: Hungary's overnight interest rates ended steady at 19.75 percent after routine trading on Wednesday, traders said.
Overnight rates traded in a narrow range between 19.625 and 19.875 percent with most deals struck at 19.75 percent.
"It looks like current levels will hold for the rest of August," said Erika Kaiser of Budapest Bank.
Inter-bank overnight rates hovered between 19.50 and 20.00 percent since the beginning of the banks' two-week reserve period on August 1.
